articles.author: Nimi Princewill
articles.title: South African government refuses to help hundreds of illegal miners in disused shaft - CNN
articles.description: Several hundred people are believed to remain in an illegal mine in South Africa after the government cut off vital supplies and refused to help them, in a dramatic bid to crack down on the industry.
articles.content: Several hundred people are believed to remain in an illegal mine in South Africa after the government cut off vital supplies and refused to help them, in a dramatic bid to crack down on the industry.… [+4881 chars]
